info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Herkimer County through 900 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Utica, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Frankfort, Newport, Middleville, Fairfield, West Frankfort, Corrado Corners, Curtis, Harbor, Farrel Corner, Countryman, North Ilion, Burrell Corners, Kelhi Corners, Eatonville, Old City and Johnson Corners. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
